com.google.orkut.client.api
Class GetAlbumsTx

java.lang.Object
  com.google.orkut.client.api.Transaction
      com.google.orkut.client.api.GetAlbumsTx

public class GetAlbumsTx
extends Transaction

A Transaction to get one (or multiple) albums from orkut.

Note: The albums returned for a given user may vary with the permission-settings.

Author:
Shishir Birmiwal

Method Summary
 boolean canGetMoreAlbums()
          Returns true if there are more albums which can be fetched using AlbumsTxFactory.getNextAlbums(GetAlbumsTx).

          Returns the number of Albums fetched in this request.

Method Detail

setCount

public GetAlbumsTx setCount(int count)
Sets the number of Albums to fetch.

getAlbumCount

public int getAlbumCount()
Returns the number of Albums fetched in this request.

getAlbum

public Album getAlbum(int index)
Returns the Album at index. Valid values for index are from 0 to getAlbumCount(){code -1}. Use this to get the Albums returned from the transaction generated using AlbumsTxFactory.getAlbums(String).

getAlbum

public Album getAlbum()
Get the album requested using AlbumsTxFactory.getAlbum(String, String).

Returns:
the album returned for the request

canGetMoreAlbums

public boolean canGetMoreAlbums()
Returns true if there are more albums which can be fetched using AlbumsTxFactory.getNextAlbums(GetAlbumsTx).
